title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ for Oscar Guzman Flies Again Mission Challenges
content:
Go above and beyond cruising altitude by fulfilling Mission Challenges in Oscar Guzman Flies Again — these include delivering an additional Mogul or DH-7 Iron Mule chopper, or collecting optional upgrades and equipment. This week, they’ll net you 2X GTA$.

Finish The Titan Job and solidify Oscar’s revenge to receive a GTA$200,000 bonus within 72 hours of completion.
